meanings.definition: The quality or state of being preternatural.
meanings.sent1: Her preternaturalness in solving puzzles amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The preternaturalness of the situation left us all in awe.
meanings.sent3: His preternaturalness at guessing people's ages was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The preternaturalness of the storm made it seem like nature was angry.
meanings.sent5: The preternaturalness of the glowing mushrooms in the forest was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being beyond what is normal or natural.
meanings.sent1: The preternaturalness of her strength was unmatched in the competition.
meanings.sent2: We were all struck by the preternaturalness of the phenomenon.
meanings.sent3: The preternaturalness of the cat's ability to find its way home was both surprising and amusing.
meanings.sent4: His preternaturalness on the basketball court made him a legend in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The preternaturalness of the old tree's ability to survive harsh winters was truly remarkable.
